src:
Srhljivka v Kopru: v trgovino vstopil zamaskiran s pištolo v roki
Policija ga še išče.
04 Nov 2019, 18:12 by T. V.
KOPER – V soboto ob 13.03 so policisti dobili klic, da je pred 15 minutami v trgovino na Vanganelski cesti v Kopru prišel zamaskiran moški. Stopil je do blagajniškega pulta in od prodajalca zahteval denar, grožnje pa podkrepil s pištolo. Zatem je pritisnil na ekran blagajne, da bi odprl predal z denarjem, vendar neuspešno, nato pa je brez plena pobegnil.Policisti nadaljujejo z zbiranjem informacij.
text:
Heartbreaker in Koper: Entered the store with a gun masked in his hand
Police are still looking for him.
04 Nov 2019, 18:12 by T.V.
KOPER - A police officer got a call on Saturday at 1.03pm that a masked man had arrived at a shop on Vanganelska Street in Koper 15 minutes ago. He walked over to the cashier's desk and demanded money from the seller, backing up his threats with a gun. He then pressed the cash register screen to open the cash drawer, but failed, and then escaped without loot. The police officers continued to gather information.
